hero.title: Academic Audio Transcription
hero.description: Transform your academic recordings into precise, formatted transcripts with our advanced AI-powered platform. Supporting 134+ languages with 99.8% accuracy for research interviews, lectures, and academic discussions.

speed.title: Rapid Processing
speed.description: Process long academic recordings quickly with our advanced AI technology. Handle files up to 10 hours long or 5GB in size with ease.

accuracy.title: Intelligent Formatting
accuracy.description: Automatic paragraph structuring and formatting optimized for academic content, making it easier to review and cite in your research.

format.title: Multilingual Support
format.description: Support for over 100 languages with high accuracy, perfect for international research and global academic collaboration.

timestamps.title: Flexible File Handling
timestamps.description: Upload various audio formats including MP3, WAV, M4A, and more. Perfect for different recording devices and situations.

export.title: Multiple Export Formats
export.description: Export your transcripts in various formats including TXT, DOC, PDF, and SRT with timestamps for easy integration into your research workflow.

integration.title: Timestamp Integration
integration.description: Precise timestamps for every paragraph, making it easy to navigate between your transcript and audio recording.

whisperTech.title: Powered by Whisper Technology
whisperTech.description: Our platform leverages OpenAI's state-of-the-art Whisper technology, ensuring the highest quality transcriptions with remarkable accuracy across multiple languages and accents. This advanced AI model has been trained on thousands of hours of academic content to deliver superior results for research and educational purposes.

items.question: What file formats are supported?
items.answer: Our platform supports a wide range of audio formats including MP3, WAV, M4A, AAC, and WMA. Files can be up to 10 hours long or 5GB in size, making it suitable for lengthy academic recordings.

items.question: How accurate is the transcription?
items.answer: We achieve 99.8% accuracy across 134+ languages, thanks to OpenAI's Whisper technology. The accuracy is particularly high for clear academic speech and professional recordings.

items.question: What languages are supported?
items.answer: Our platform supports over 100 languages with high accuracy, including major academic languages such as English, Mandarin, Spanish, German, French, and Japanese, among many others.

items.question: How are timestamps implemented?
items.answer: Timestamps are automatically generated for each paragraph, making it easy to navigate between your transcript and audio. This feature is particularly useful for citation and verification purposes.
